title: NAMI BILGEWATER SKIN BETTER BE HAPPENING!
body: If Nami doesn't get a new skin with this Bilgewater stuff, i'll be bloody fuming.

replies.body: No dice on this one - but she does have Koi Nami chromas that just hit PBE!
Are we getting a new Lissandra skin soon please ?
Lmao Nami in a pirate hat should be easy lol and give her an eye patch. take her staff and give her a cane. lol
